//volgendgetal.ps frm:10 spn:5 max:100 spr:5 stp:10
//klopt de rij heen/terug
//heen
//10 20 30 40#10,20,30,40,50#50
20 30 40 50#20,30,40,50,60#60
30 40 50 60#30,40,50,60,70#70
40 50 60 70#40,50,60,70,80#80
50 60 70 80#50,60,70,80,90#90
60 70 80 90#60,70,80,90,100#100
//terug
//50 40 30 20#50,40,30,20,10#10
60 50 40 30#60,50,40,30,20#20
70 60 50 40#70,60,50,40,30#30
80 70 60 50#80,70,60,50,40#40
90 80 70 60#90,80,70,60,50#50
100 90 80 70#100,90,80,70,60#60

//Saved to ..\output\kloptderij.txt
